name: Pathologic Classic HD

files.game: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG

task.name: winetricks
task.app: d3dx9 devenum directmusic dsound msxml3 nocrashdialog quartz wmp9 wmp10 wsh57

content:
exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Pathologic Classic HD/bin/Final/Game.exe
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /silent /nogui /suppressmsgboxes
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9 devenum directmusic dsound msxml3 nocrashdialog quartz wmp9 wmp10 wsh57
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
